algorithms.name: citation-pagerank
algorithms.description: PageRank algorithm on citation network to identify influential papers
algorithms.usage: Identifies the most influential papers based on citation patterns. Higher PageRank scores indicate papers that are cited by other influential papers.

algorithms.name: coauthor-louvain
algorithms.description: Louvain community detection on co-author network to identify research communities

graphProjection.name: coauthor-network
graphProjection.relationshipQuery: MATCH (p1:Person)-[:AUTHORED]->(d:Document)<-[:AUTHORED]-(p2:Person) WHERE p1 <> p2 RETURN id(p1) AS source, id(p2) AS target, count(d) AS weight

algorithms.usage: Detects research communities by analyzing co-authorship patterns. Authors who frequently collaborate will be grouped into the same community.

projections.name: citation-network
projections.description: Native projection of citation relationships between documents

projections.name: coauthor-network
projections.description: Cypher projection creating weighted collaboration edges between authors
projections.nodeQuery: MATCH (p:Person) RETURN id(p) AS id, p.name AS name, p.affiliation AS affiliation
projections.relationshipQuery: MATCH (p1:Person)-[:AUTHORED]->(d:Document)<-[:AUTHORED]-(p2:Person) WHERE id(p1) < id(p2) RETURN id(p1) AS source, id(p2) AS target, count(d) AS weight

projections.name: concept-network
projections.description: Cypher projection creating concept co-occurrence network through shared papers
projections.nodeQuery: MATCH (c:Concept) RETURN id(c) AS id, c.name AS name, c.field AS field
projections.relationshipQuery: MATCH (c1:Concept)<-[:STUDIES]-(d:Document)-[:STUDIES]->(c2:Concept) WHERE id(c1) < id(c2) RETURN id(c1) AS source, id(c2) AS target, count(d) AS weight

pipelines.name: influence-analysis
pipelines.description: Complete pipeline for identifying influential papers and research communities

steps.query: MATCH (d:Document) WHERE d.pagerank IS NOT NULL RETURN d.title, d.pagerank ORDER BY d.pagerank DESC LIMIT 10
